title: gccgo: panic from nil function call aborts after recovery
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Compile and run the program at http://play.golang.org/p/97Ay_xlLL6 using a recent
build of gccgo.


What is the expected output?

Recovered


What do you see instead?

Recovered
Aborted


goroutine 2 [syscall]:
no stack trace available
created by runtime_main
	/tmp/go-build-release/gccgo-srcdir/libgo/runtime/proc.c:522



Which compiler are you using?
gccgo (built from revision 193488)

Which operating system are you using?
Ubuntu Precise
